title: Pinterest Adds Elliott Executive to Its Board
description: The activist investor has also entered into a long-term agreement to help the social-media company grow.

title: Everyone in Your Feed Is Talking About ChatGPT and Lensa, and Here's Why
description: Two internet sensations give non-nerds a turn at artificial intelligence, yielding surprising wit and stunning avatars.

title: Lawmakers Want Answers From Silvergate About FTX Transfers
description: A trio of senators said an account at the bank “appears to be at the center” of the improper transfer of customer funds.

title: TikTok National-Security Deal Faces More Delays
description: Officials and executives had hoped for a year-end deal to address national-security concerns over the popular social-media platform.

title: Meta's Targeted Ad Model Faces Restrictions in EU
description: European Union privacy regulators say Facebook and Instagram shouldn’t use their terms of service to require users to accept ads based on their digital activity.

title: NRG Energy to Buy Vivint Smart Home for $2.8 Billion
description: Deal for Vivint, which offers integrated home systems that include security, lighting and other services, would accelerate NRG’s consumer-focused growth strategy.

title: Amazon Kindle Scribe vs. ReMarkable 2: Better Than Pen and Paper---for a Price
description: Take notes? Consider a distraction-free device with all the benefits of a modern, cloud-based backup.

title: HBO Max Comes Back to Amazon's Platform After Yearlong Absence
description: The streaming service will be available on Amazon Prime Video Channels as its parent looks to increase revenue.

title: Google Faces Pressure in Hong Kong Over Search Results for National Anthem
description: Google is under fire from officials and legislators in Hong Kong over a pro-democracy song showing up in search results for the national anthem.

title: Meta's Oversight Board Criticizes VIP User Program
description: Meta Platforms has long given unfair deference to VIP users of its Facebook and Instagram services under a program called “cross check” and has misled the public about the program, the company’s oversight board said in a report.

title: Theranos Ex-President Sunny Balwani to Be Sentenced Wednesday
description: The former executive at the blood-testing startup faces a longer prison term than his boss after founder Elizabeth Holmes was sentenced to 11¼ years.

title: TSMC Raises Arizona Chip Investment to $40 Billion as Biden Visits
description: The Taiwan company plans second factory at the U.S. site to make advanced semiconductors.

title: Uber Reaches Settlement With Chicago Over Fees and Restaurant Listings
description: Restaurants were listed without their consent and were charged excessive fees, according to a two-year investigation by the city.

title: Facebook Threatens to Pull News From Platform if Bill Passes Congress
description: Journalism Competition and Preservation Act is meant to help publishers team up to negotiate payments from tech companies.

title: U.S., EU Agree to Coordinate Semiconductor Subsidy Programs
description: The two sides at a meeting make little progress over U.S. electric-car subsidies, an issue raised by the French president during his White House visit.
